description: 1 x Chinese Privet (applicants ref. T1) - Approximately 7.00m.  Reduce crown by approximately 1.50m. Thin crown density by 20%.  Raise crown by up to 1.00m.  Remove dead wood.  Reason: General maintenance.1 x Mature Viburnum (applicants ref. S1) - Approximately 5.00m.  Reduce by up to 1.00m to reshape & balance.  Reason:  General maintenance.1 x Cypress (applicants ref. T2) - Approximately 8.00m.  Fell to ground level & grind stump to approximately 350mm below current ground level.  Reason:  To facilitate minor re-landscaping work.  Replacement tree to be replanted.Mixed Species Shrubs (applicants ref. G1) - Shape & tidy as required.  Reason:  General maintenance.1 x Cypress (applicants ref. T3) - Approximately 8.00m.  Fell to ground level & grind stump to approximately 350mm below current ground level. Reason:  To facilitate minor re-landscaping work.  Replacement tree will be replanted.1 x Cypress (applicants ref. T4) - Approximately 8.00m.  Fell to ground level & grind stump to approximately 350mm below current ground level.1 x Cypress (applicants ref. T5) - Approximately 5.00m.  Fell to ground level & grind stump to approximately 350mm below current ground level.1 x Cypress  (applicants ref. T6) - Approximately 6.00m.  Fell to ground level & grind stump to approximately 350mm below current ground level.1 x Portuguese Laurel  (applicants ref. T7) - Approximately 4.00m.  Fell to ground level.  Grind stump to approximately 350mm below current ground level.1 x Cypress  (applicants ref. T8) - Approximately 8.00m.  Fell to ground level & grind stump to approximately 350mm below current ground level. Reasons:  To facilitate minor re-landscaping work.  Replacement trees will be replanted.
